name: A simpler alternative to cert-manager with Nabeel Sulieman, Senior Software Engineer at Vercel (Ship It! #46)
summary: Nabeel Sulieman, Senior Software Engineer at Vercel, talks about KCert, a simpler alternative to cert-manager that he built. Gerhard tried it out, and he thinks that Nabeel is onto something. If you want to see the video that they recorded, ping us on Twitter or Slack. We love this story, especially the long-term appro...
